title: Merging in the 50 day fake commit update.

title: Adding in keepalive to make commit after 50 days
body: Github cron cancels scheduled jobs at 60 days with no change.  This makes simple commits at 50 days to keep nightly running and not stop testing the latest cargo releases.

title: Update dependencies
body: This updates the generated version of `casper-execution-engine` to 2.0.1.

title: Update toolchain unit test to only run on dev branch
body: Backport of #36 to `dev` branch.

title: Update toolchain unit test to only run on dev branch
body: This PR updates the unit test for the toolchain file to only run when testing against the `dev` branch.  This should be sufficient to ensure that published versions of cargo-casper use the correct pinned Rust version at the point when they're published.

title: Update to handle recent changes to casper-node
body:
This PR includes a few small changes to match recent updates to casper-node's `dev` branch.

* updates the pinned Rust version to `nightly-2022-08-03`
* removes usage of deprecated `DEFAULT_RUN_GENESIS_REQUEST` from generated tests
* updates this crate's test to invoke a generated project's `make test` with the env var `RUSTFLAGS="-D warnings"` set
* fixes new clippy warnings

title: Update tests to handle empty CI env vars
body: This PR fixes the incorrect assumption that the CI env vars `GITHUB_BASE_REF` and `GITHUB_REF_NAME` would be unset rather than set to empty strings.

title: Update in preparation for dev branch
body:
This PR updates the cargo-casper tool to be compatible with current changes in the `dev` branch of the `casper-node` repo.  It updates the test suite as follows:
* if a PR is made targeting the `main` branch, or CI is run on the `main` branch, `should_run_cargo_casper_using_published_crates` is run.  This test executes cargo-casper to generate a project which itself depends upon only the most recent published Casper crates, and runs `make test` in that generated project
* if a PR is made targeting branch `b`, or CI is run on branch `b`, `should_run_cargo_casper_using_git_overrides` is run.  This test is similar to the one above, except the generated project's manifests contain overrides for the Casper deps, specifying the GitHub URL of the `casper-node` crate and branch `b`, with versions set to `"*"`.

This allows for `main` being updated to keep the current published version of `cargo-casper` compatible with the latest published Casper dependencies, while allowing for feature branches (like `dev`) to be developed in parallel with their namesake feature branches in the `casper-node` repo.

title: Switch App to Command due to cargo update

title: Update pinned toolchain version and dependencies
body:
This PR updates the pinned Rust toolchain version as per the recent similar change in casper-node.

It is required as the older pinned version doesn't correctly handle a recent change made to the transitive dependency `uint`.

title: Updated dependencies
body:
This PR updates the crate's dependencies, and also the casper dependencies of the generated projects.

The updates should have no impact on downstream users.

title: Update casper dependencies
body:
This updates the tool to use the latest published version of the casper crates in generated projects.

It also updates the tests to use crate versions as provided by crates.io, making the check for latest versions more robust.

title: Update dependencies
body:
This PR updates the dependencies, in particular fixing the breaking change in `clap`.

Closes #9.

title: ZH-SRE-I243: initial commit of ci and publish pipelines
body:
Adds:
- `.github/workflows/ci-cargo-casper.yml`
    - runs on `pull-request` and `push` to `main` branch
    - ignores markdown file changes
- `.github/workflows/publish-cargo-casper.yml`
    - runs when a `release` is published
    - publishes crate to `crates.io`
    
Ticket: https://app.zenhub.com/workspaces/cn-sre-60d363546afb85000e491ff6/issues/casper-network/sre/243

title: Accept --git-url.
body:
# About These Changes

* Updates the CLI to accept a hidden `--git-url` argument.
* Adds basic argument validation.
* Sets Cargo.toml patch section to use either a path or a git url as a locator.
* Depends on #1

title: Update cargo-casper to use casper-engine-test-support 2.0.2

* Update dependencies to latest version.
* Update generated test to use types from the latest version of `casper-engine-test-support` (`2.0.2`).
